item.title: Segment Trees for overlapping intervals
item.description: Today we’re gonna look into how to use segment trees to effeciently find intervals that overlap with a given point. function drawCursor() { drawingContext.setLineDash([2, 20]) background(255) stroke(color(0, 100, 0)) line(mouseX, 0, mouseX, height) } and then from dataclasses import dataclass, field from typing import Optional, List, Tuple, Callable from math import floor @dataclass class Endpoint: v: float ix: int Visualization of the algorithm: Article content goes here.
